panels.description: system.cpu.total.pct：The percentage of CPU time spent in states other than Idle and IOWait.
panels.title: CPU 使用率

panels.description: system.filesystem.used.pct：The percentage of used disk space.

targets.query: event.module: "system" AND metricset.name: "filesystem" AND (system.filesystem.mount_point: "/hostfs/opt/Logs" OR system.filesystem.mount_point: "/hostfs")

panels.title: Disk 使用率

panels.description: system.filesystem.total：The total disk space in bytes.

targets.query: event.module: "system" AND metricset.name: "filesystem" AND (system.filesystem.mount_point: "/hostfs/opt/Logs" OR system.filesystem.mount_point: "/hostfs")

panels.title: Disk 總量

panels.description: system.memory.free：The total amount of free memory in bytes. This value does not include memory consumed by system caches and buffers.
panels.title: Memory 剩餘量

panels.description: system.filesystem.free：The disk space available in bytes.

targets.query: event.module: "system" AND metricset.name: "filesystem" AND (system.filesystem.mount_point: "/hostfs/opt/Logs" OR system.filesystem.mount_point: "/hostfs")

panels.title: Disk 剩餘量
